price: 71. O, mensen van het boek, waarom mengen jullie de waarheid met de leugen en bedekken jullie de waarheid, terwijl jullie die kennen?
arabic: يَٰٓأَهۡلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لِمَ تَلۡبِسُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ بِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ وَتَكۡتُمُونَ ٱلۡحَقَّ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: yāahla al-kitābi lima talbisūna al-ḥaqa bil-bāṭili wataktumūna al-ḥaqa wa-antum taʿlamūna
